Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Sahu hai rata di, jadom uha (dina te) cha jave
Ate dina di jadom uha prakasamana ho jave
Ate usa de paida kite nara ate mada di (sahu)
Ki tuhade yatana vakhare-vakhare hana
Tam jisa ne (alaha de raha vica dhana) dita ate uha dari'a
Ate usa ne bhala'i nu saca mani'a
Tam usa nu asim saukhe raha la'i sahulata devange
Ate jisa ne kajusi kiti ate lapvaha riha
Ate bhala'i tom inakara kita
Tam asim usa nu aukhe raha te pavange
Ate jadom uha kha'i (naraka) vica digega tam usa di ja'idada usa de kama nahim avegi
Besaka sadi zimevari hai raha dasana
Ate besaka sade adhikara vica hai, praloka ate sasara
So maim tuhanu bharakadi ho'i aga tom dara dita
Usa vica uha hi digega jihara bara madabhaga hai
Jisa ne jhuthala'i'a ate muha mauri'a
Zi'ada darana vali'am nu usa tom surakhi'ata rakhi'a javega
Jihara pavitara hona la'i apani ja'idada dida hai
Ate usa da kise te, ko'i upakara nahim?Jisa da badala usa ne laina hove
Pratu sirafa apane azima alaha di khusi la'i
Ate jaladi hi uha prasana ho javega
